peer5.description:
The Peer5 P2P distribution learn more.
Requirements: Google Chrome version (M26+) Other browsers use HTTP progressive streaming.
The highest bitrate available is used, unless specified otherwise using mediaProxy.preferedFlavorBR param

url.doc: The video URL to override the existing URL loaded from Kaltura.

overlayUI.doc: Flag to enable a visualization overlay.

proxy.doc: Flag to enable the Peer5 proxy. Set to false only if you are certain your content is compatible. (The default is true.)
